data.text: @xroblockx Wow. HPL Foundation hosted a discussion with the director a few years ago. Our own slice of Houston history!

@TiffanyForAlief I saw it at MFAH with my mom, who grew up in Bellaire. She shared the middle school she went to had moved all those trophies that kids had won from the middle school in Riverside to this school in Meyerland, where many of these white families moved after leaving Riverside.
@xroblockx I was able to buy the DVD from the MFAH yearssssssss ago. I assign it for my introduction course.

I adopted the theme from the 1987 documentary film by Jon Schwartz that chronicles the history of Houston's Riverside neighborhood.

My scholarship informs my public service and my public service informs my scholarship; I am grateful that both get to benefit the people.
